contact.parkingDetail: Free parking available in front of the clinic.

home.clinicIntro: Xiacaotang TCM Clinic is located in Mississauga, serving the Greater Toronto Area. Dr. Yang Xia provides expert treatments for chronic conditions.

insurance.title: Insurance Accepted
insurance.desc: We directly bill most Extended Health Plans (Corporate Insurance) and accept Auto Insurance (MVA).

about.mission: Our Mission: To restore balance and health through the wisdom of Traditional Chinese Medicine.
